name: Stream
headline: AI-Powered Medical Document Review for Workers' Comp
description: Stream enables insurance and adjacent professionals such as lawyers, nurses, and claim adjusters to review medical documents faster and better than ever before.

founders.name: Eric Yen, Founder
founders.description: Workers' comp claims adjuster turned builder.

founders.name: Eilam Levitov, Founder
founders.description: Originally from Israel I moved to the Bay Area back in 2014 to attend UC Berkeley and never left.

# Generative AI for workers' comp
Turn stacks of medical documents into clean, clear, actionable summaries with Stream – an LLM-powered platform to make sense of the 10 billion pages of workers' comp docs clogging up the system.
[Request a Demo](http://www.stream.claims/<#>)
## Stream is trusted by industry leaders
![Arrowhead evaluation services](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fbfff00b6ff22b848171bd/66fe8b2237428c80596342b7_Stream%20Backed%20Logo%2001.png)![Sharp Medical Evaluations](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fbfff00b6ff22b848171bd/66fe8b22196667a792d66490_Stream%20Backed%20Logo%2002.png)![Qualified Med Eval](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fbfff00b6ff22b848171bd/66fe8b22109064f3e78b7192_Stream%20Backed%20Logo%2003.png)![Total Care Medical Comp](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fbfff00b6ff22b848171bd/66fe8b22b1e3cafb10953bfc_Stream%20Backed%20Logo%2004.png)![Matrix Document Imaging](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fbfff00b6ff22b848171bd/66fe8b22497e4b55f738ab8a_Stream%20Backed%20Logo%2005.png)
## Immediate Impact to your Organization
4X
ROI from eliminating manual review
24H
turnaroundon summaries
27%
savings on med-legal records review costs
Services
## A tailored solution for your WC document review needs
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fbfff00b6ff22b848171bd/66ffb0b2ffef70e46565fb9c_Stream%20Illustration%206.avif)Stream CHronoAI Indexing & Summarization PlatformAI Summarization PlatformTransform medical documents into actionable summaries tailored to medical specialties, then review and edit in minutes.Learn more](http://www.stream.claims/</services/stream-chrono>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fbfff00b6ff22b848171bd/66ffb0b2efd8340fb0bfb554_Stream%20Illustration%207.avif)Stream Chrono+Expert Medical Chronologies & SummariesExpert Medical Chronologies & SummariesExperience a full-service solution where AI-powered summaries are reviewed by Stream's in-house medical and legal professionals.Learn more](http://www.stream.claims/</services/stream-chrono-plus>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fbfff00b6ff22b848171bd/66ffb0b30e8ccbab28c4a01f_Stream%20Illustration%208.avif)Stream siftDocument Deduplication & DeclutteringDocument Cleanup & De-DuplicationIdentify and remove duplicates and irrelevant pages from document sets to save on review costs and time.Learn more](http://www.stream.claims/</services/stream-sift>)
benefits
## AI tools tailor-made for worker’s comp
[Request a Demo](http://www.stream.claims/<#>)
### A New Standard
Trained on over 1M pages of WC records, Stream's AI models produce best-in-class results specifically designed for WC.
### Validated by Experts
We built an in-house team of MDs, nurses, lawyers, and claims adjusters to review every AI-generated summary before it’s sent out.
### Just Enough Detail
Stream processes hundreds of pages of medical documents into clear, simple summaries that are easy to understand.
### Real-time results
Regain control of your operations with the accurate, high-quality, and real-time results of Stream Chrono and Stream Sift.
## Customer Testimonials
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fc31e83b4d89573cbf5d7c/670718d16233b265a00382f0_arrowhead%20gray.png)
"Stream's combination of expert engineers and industry specialists ensure that their AI models are tailored precisely to our unique needs. The level of customization and responsiveness they've provided has truly exceeded our expectations."
Tina Perez
Record Review Quality Coordinator, Arrowhead Evaluation Services
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fc31e83b4d89573cbf5d7c/66ffa3784329bd912a7c228b_Stream%20Backed%20Logo%2005.png)
“With Stream's high quality and quick turnaround time, I'm able to pursue more revenue opportunities while maintaining customer satisfaction on my side.”
Thomas Smith
CEO, Matrix Document Imaging
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/plugins/Basic/assets/placeholder.60f9b1840c.svg)
“Stream has transformed our workflow. The efficiency and accuracy of their service allowed us to significantly reduce our manual review workload, to the point where we were able to streamline our team and reallocate resources. Stream has saved us time, reduced costs, and improved the overall quality of our operation.”
Operations Director
CA Industrial Medicine Group
## Why work with Stream?
01
We are SOC 2 Type II and HIPAA certified — your documents stay secure and compliant.
02
You can leverage AI without the overhead — no integrations or IT build out needed.
03
Our AI is trained by workers comp experts — specialized for your use case.
[Request a Demo](http://www.stream.claims/<#>)
## Frequently Asked Questions
How secure is the data processed by Stream?
Stream takes data security seriously. We are HIPAA & SOC 2 certified, ensuring that all data remains confidential and protected.
How accurate are Stream's summaries?
Stream's AI-powered medical summaries boast a 99%+ accuracy rate for commonly extracted values. Stream's WC experts-in-the-loop further validate our AI output.
What kind of support do I get during the onboarding process?
Stream's Customer Success team dedicates resources and expertise during onboarding to ensure your specific needs are met.
What is the turnaround time for document processing?
Our Stream Chrono & Stream Sift products process documents in real-time, providing you with results in minutes. Our full end-to-end service, Stream Chrono+, processes documents in 1 to 3 days.
### Still have questions?
Feel free to reach out to us.
[Contact us](http://www.stream.claims/<http:/finsweet.com/client-first/docs>)
## As seen in
[![WSJ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fbfff00b6ff22b848171bd/670c07d83f29b78e0daf6a2b_Seen%20Logo%204.svg)](http://www.stream.claims/<https:/createsend.com/t/d-10135BEC8506AA442540EF23F30FEDED>)[![Fortune](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fbfff00b6ff22b848171bd/670c07d84458519e4d275418_Seen%20Logo%206.svg)](http://www.stream.claims/<https:/links.newsletter.fortune.com/e/evib?_t=5c2d888702774d17aa3d0350287b6d73&_m=0c061ccc002b46ff97103375ec21af9d&_e=TSu29M9Ahr8cz3Lz-dOddU5BnTY9GEEaZCBEigelKsSa46gcmkVKJ8lfpPXundgr>)[![The Insurer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fbfff00b6ff22b848171bd/670c07d8c486e547ac2e7905_Seen%20Logo%202.svg)](http://www.stream.claims/<https:/www.theinsurer.com/news/workers-comp-insurtech-stream-raises-5-3mn-in-spark-capital-led-seed-round/>)[![Coverager](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fbfff00b6ff22b848171bd/670c07d81a89ee901393b11b_Seen%20Logo%201.png)](http://www.stream.claims/<https:/coverager.com/stream-raises-5-3-million/>)[![Insurtech Insights](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fbfff00b6ff22b848171bd/670c07d821455d65460a1924_Seen%20Logo%205.png)](http://www.stream.claims/<https:/www.insurtechinsights.com/stream-claims-secures-us5-3-million-in-seed-funding-for-ai-driven-medical-document-review/>)[![Axios](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fbfff00b6ff22b848171bd/670c07d889dd82010c07416b_Seen%20Logo%203.svg)](http://www.stream.claims/<https:/www.axios.com/pro/health-tech-deals/2024/10/09/stream-seed-workers-compensation>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fbfff00b6ff22b848171bd/66fd2f5735e1780b0f77dbf9_cta%20bg.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66fbfff00b6ff22b848171bd/66fd2f5735e1780b0f77dbf9_cta%20bg.svg)
## See Stream in action — claim your free summary
Schedule a demo and we'll send you a free sample of any WC document set.
[Request a Demo](http://www.stream.claims/<#>)

generated_description:
**Stream: Revolutionizing Medical Document Review with AI**

Founded in 2022 and based in San Francisco, Stream is an innovative company tackling a significant pain point in workers' compensation: the overwhelming backlog of medical documents. It emerged from Y Combinator's Batch S22, gathering momentum as it aims to streamline the process for insurance professionals, lawyers, nurses, and claims adjusters, allowing them to review medical documents with unprecedented speed and efficiency.

**Mission and Services**

Stream's mission centers around providing AI-powered medical document review specifically for workers' compensation cases. With their cutting-edge platform, they transform sprawling stacks of medical paperwork into concise, actionable summaries. This helps alleviate the 10 billion pages of documents that are hampering timely decision-making in the industry.

Their product offerings include:
- **Stream Chrono**: A real-time document processing platform.
- **Stream Chrono+**: An end-to-end medical document review service, paired with human expertise to ensure accuracy.
- **Stream Sift**: A deduplication and decluttering service that rationalizes document sets to save time and costs.

By leveraging machine learning models trained on over a million pages of workers' compensation records, Stream guarantees best-in-class results tailored specifically for this niche.

**Impact and Efficiency**

What really sets Stream apart is its operational impact. Users have reported a staggering 4x return on investment by eliminating manual reviews, a 24-hour turnaround for summaries, and a 27% reduction in costs associated with med-legal record reviews. This is made possible through their team of experts—including MDs, nurses, and lawyers—who verify the AI-generated summaries for additional assurance.

**Trust and Compliance**

Privacy and data security are paramount in healthcare, so Stream proudly carries SOC 2 Type II and HIPAA certifications. This ensures that any data processed through their platform remains secure and compliant.

**The Team Behind Stream**

With a lean but dedicated team of 12 employees, Stream is led by Group Partner Jared Friedman. They are carving out a significant space in the growing intersection of fintech, SaaS, B2B, and insurance sectors.

**Customer Testimonials and Recognition**

The company's innovation hasn't gone unnoticed. Industry leaders trust Stream for its quality and efficiency. As noted by clients like Tina Perez from Arrowhead Evaluation Services, Stream's customizations and responsiveness have exceeded expectations, while others like Thomas Smith from Matrix Document Imaging highlight its impact on revenue opportunities and customer satisfaction.

Articles highlighting Stream's efforts have appeared in reputable outlets like The Wall Street Journal and Axios, confirming its relevance and potential for transforming the workers' compensation landscape.

To see how Stream can enhance your operations, you can [request a demo](http://www.stream.claims/#).

In short, Stream is not just another tech company; it’s a game-changer that's applying AI to cut through the clutter in medical document review, creating real value for professionals in a field often bogged down by paperwork.
